scrape.title: The dinner
scrape.author: Aparna
scrape.text: Sociopathic, rich characters who have no sense of personal responsibility whatsoever have a very private conversation in a very public, overpriced restaurant. Weird, interesting structure that jumped back and forth; kinda hard to keep up with. There was no real reasoning behind any of the characters’ actions, and you pretty much end up hating all them. A lot of the events didn’t make sense. 3* because at least I was able to finish this book.
